extendedInfo.description: Get this app for free! At ConstructionKnowledge.net, our resource for learning about construction, sign up for the newsletter or like us on Facebook. Then shoot us an email so we can refund your purchase.Wood Beam Design for Construction:An easy to use wood beam design calculator for construction & building.Inputs:span, beam size, lumber type and option of point load or uniformly distributed load (only simple beam spans included).Outputs:calculated stress in bending, the allowable stress of your beam type and the calculated and allowed deflection.ConstructionKnowledge.net:These apps our part of our mission at ConstructionKnowledge.net to help those in construction to learn and rise in this crazy world of construction. Please send us your ideas for apps, suggestions for new web content and follow our blog. It's Ned's fun and informative take on the construction industry.

reviews.title: Mediocre interface
reviews.comment: Very tedious to run through multiple scenarios - different wood, more members. Convenient in principle.
reviews.author: Keith Winston

reviews.comment: Great, simple app for wood beam or joist design in the field. Doesn\'t have lots of options, but the basics. Excellent help screens to show how to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good, I just like it. Quick and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very easy to use when you want to make sure a piece of wood is strong enough to pull something out of a pit
reviews.author: A Google User
